      This stores the current real-time solving speed saved in the preferences file.

      This field is shown in the window and the user can enter the speed into this field.
      private javax.swing.JButton restoreDefaultsButton
      Clicking this button restores the default preferences and updates the fields accordingly.

      Clicking this button submits the data in the window for validation.

      This stores the default scramble text size.

      This stores the current scramble text size saved in the preferences file.

      This field is shown in the window and the user can enter the scramble text size this field.

      This label is shown in the window with the text ‘Scramble text size'.
      private static long serialVersionUID
      Default serialVersionUID
      private static javax.swing.ButtonGroup solvePieceWarningButtonGroup
      This button group stores the solvePieceWarningYesItem and the solvePieceWarningNoItem radio buttons.
      private javax.swing.JLabel solvePieceWarningLabel
      This label is shown in the window with the text ‘Show Click-to-Solve warning’.
      private static javax.swing.JRadioButton solvePieceWarningNoItem
      By selecting this radio button, the warning/information message will not be shown when ‘Click to Solve’ mode is enabled.
      private static javax.swing.JRadioButton solvePieceWarningYesItem
      By selecting this radio button, a warning/information message will be shown when ‘Click to Solve’ mode is enabled.
      private static int ySpacing
      This indicates the vertical spacing beween the elements in the window.

      • pad

        private static final int pad
        This stores the padding of the elements in the window. The greater the padding, the further towards the centre of the window the elements will be.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        This stores the width of the window.

        This stores the buttons in the window.

      • realTimeSolvingRateLabel

        private javax.swing.JLabel realTimeSolvingRateLabel
        This label is shown in the window with the text ‘Real-time solving speed (ms)’.

      • inspectionTimeLabel

        private javax.swing.JLabel inspectionTimeLabel
        This label is shown in the window with the text ‘Inspection time (seconds)'.

      • solvePieceWarningLabel

        private javax.swing.JLabel solvePieceWarningLabel
        This label is shown in the window with the text ‘Show Click-to-Solve warning’.

      • scrambleTextSizeLabel

        private javax.swing.JLabel scrambleTextSizeLabel
        This label is shown in the window with the text ‘Scramble text size'.

      • realTimeSolvingSpeedField

        private javax.swing.JTextField realTimeSolvingSpeedField
        This field is shown in the window and the user can enter the speed into this field.

      • inspectionTimeField

        private javax.swing.JTextField inspectionTimeField
        This field is shown in the window and the user can enter the inspection time into this field.

      • scrambleTextSizeField

        private javax.swing.JTextField scrambleTextSizeField
        This field is shown in the window and the user can enter the scramble text size this field.

      • solvePieceWarningButtonGroup

        private static javax.swing.ButtonGroup solvePieceWarningButtonGroup
        This button group stores the solvePieceWarningYesItem and the solvePieceWarningNoItem radio buttons. Using the button group, only one of the two radio buttons can be selected, not both.

      • solvePieceWarningYesItem

        private static javax.swing.JRadioButton solvePieceWarningYesItem
        By selecting this radio button, a warning/information message will be shown when ‘Click to Solve’ mode is enabled. If the solvePieceWarningNoItem is selected, then no message will be shown.

      • solvePieceWarningNoItem

        private static javax.swing.JRadioButton solvePieceWarningNoItem
        By selecting this radio button, the warning/information message will not be shown when ‘Click to Solve’ mode is enabled. If the solvePieceWarningYesItem is selected, then the message will be shown.

      • saveAndCloseButton

        private javax.swing.JButton saveAndCloseButton
        Clicking this button submits the data in the window for validation. If the data is valid, then the window Preferences window will close.

      • cancelButton

        private javax.swing.JButton cancelButton
        Clicking this button discards any unsaved changes and closes the window.

      • restoreDefaultsButton

        private javax.swing.JButton restoreDefaultsButton
        Clicking this button restores the default preferences and updates the fields accordingly.

      • realTimeSolvingSpeed

        private static int realTimeSolvingSpeed
        This stores the current real-time solving speed saved in the preferences file.

      • inspectionTime

        private static int inspectionTime
        This stores the current inspection time saved in the preferences file.

      • scrambleTextSize

        private static int scrambleTextSize
        This stores the current scramble text size saved in the preferences file.

    • Method Detail

      • getRealTimeSolvingRate

        public int getRealTimeSolvingRate()
        Returns:
        the real-time solving speed in milliseconds

      • getInspectionTime

        public int getInspectionTime()
        Returns:
        the time allowed to the inspect the cube before a solve starts (seconds)

      • solvePieceWarningEnabled

        public boolean solvePieceWarningEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the solvePieceWarningYesItem is selected;
        false otherwise

      • getScrambleTextSize

        public int getScrambleTextSize()
        Returns:
        the scramble text size as saved in the 'Preferences' window
